text: Johann Brandweiner (24 September 1894 – 7 January 1974) was an Austrian football player. He was a goalkeeper. He played for the Austrian national football team. ==Career== He played for Wiener AC and was part of the team which won the Austrian championship for WAC in the 1914–15 season. ==International == In 1919 he played two matches for the Austrian national football team versus Hungary.
